amendment.description: An amendment numbered 33 printed in Part B of House Report 115-711 to prohibit the use of funds to sell the transmission assets of three Power Marketing Administrations and the Tennessee Valley Authority.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Newhouse amendment (A031) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A031) offered by Mr. Newhouse.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Newhouse amendment (A031) Agreed to by voice vote.
